title: riot wonders why im toxic
body:
i waited in queue for 10 mins for this shit
https://gyazo.com/30179d222eaadbf540cb38775da854f3

replies.body: You are toxic because you are an immature kid with no self control.
I mean its not like the OP has ever done bad in a game... o wait.. 2/6/0 on yi... a month go ...
tfw you can't express negative emotions without taking it out on other players in an immature way (aka being toxic) and then blame others for your incompetance
